metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16875 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The crypto/x509 package of Go before 1.10.6 and 1.11.x before 1.11.3 doesnot limit the amount of work performed for each chain verification, whichmight allow attackers to craft pathological inputs leading to a CPU denialof service. Go TLS servers accepting client certificates and TLS clientsare affected.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
golang-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
